item.better-totems.tank_totem.tooltip: This totem gives you health and more bonuses as well as debuffs
item.better-totems.tank_totem.tooltip.sh: This totem gives you health, resistance,
regeneration, slowness, weakness and mining fatigue
item.better-totems.enhanced_totem.toolti: This totem has a better chance of avoiding your death
This totem has a 80% chance of avoiding your death
item.better-totems.chorus_totem.tooltip: This totem will teleport you on death
item.better-totems.cursed_totem.tooltip: This totem has a full chance of reviving... at a cost
This totem has a full chance of reviving
but you will revive with a random curse
item.better-totems.inventory_totem.toolt: This totem doesn't avoid your death
but will keep your inventory intact
